title: harodtiansheng
author: harodtiansheng
content: Bitcoin has been developing for so many years, but we still have not systematically cultivated talents and worked hard to build the Bitcoin ecosystem.Itâ€™s time for us to consider building a decentralized university for the Bitcoin ecosystem. I think this will bring tremendous value and impact. It can promote the vigorous development of btc ecology.If any of you are interested, you can join my tg. We welcome all people with lofty ideals to join. My tg is: haifjjfrxg

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: You'll probably get some flack from jvanname. I mean, he seems to be totally against universities.
